description: Kanon is Ringo`s Tuner and Kururu`s cousin. He has an obsession for Ringo and seems to harbor romantic intentions, but some of his ambitions shatter when he openly plots to tamper with Ikki`s ATs. He presses on in his disregard for Tool Toul To`s neutrality by actively battling against Kogarasumaru, though he at least seems to respect their leader.
name: Kanon
